```{r import_libraries}
library("tidyverse")
library("data.table")
library("knitr")
```


```{r read_expression_data}
rpkm <- fread("/Users/j.alquicira/Documents/powell_lab/projects/SingleCell_Prediction/data/13-09-2017_GTEx_data/GTEx_Analysis_v6p_RNA-seq_RNA-SeQCv1.1.8_gene_rpkm.gct", sep = "\t", header = TRUE, skip = 2)
```

```{r format_gene_names}
rownames(rpkm) <- paste(rpkm$Name, rpkm$Description, sep = "_")
rpkm$Name <- NULL
rpkm$Description <- NULL
```


```{r read_sample_metadata}
sample.metadata <- as.data.frame(fread("/Users/j.alquicira/Documents/powell_lab/projects/SingleCell_Prediction/data/13-09-2017_GTEx_data/GTEx_Data_V6_Annotations_SampleAttributesDS.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("NA", "")))
```

```{r intersect_metadata_with_gene_expression_matrix_samples}
sample.metadata <- sample.metadata[sample.metadata$SAMPID %in% names(rpkm),]
```

```{r get_sample_summary}
sample.metadata %>% 
  select(SMTS) %>% 
  group_by(SMTS) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(-n) %>% 
  kable()
```


```{r remove_samples_with_missing_SMTS_info}
sample.metadata <- sample.metadata[!is.na(sample.metadata$SMTS), ]
```


```{r perform_pca}
pca <- prcomp(rpkm, center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE)
```


```{r add_cluster_info}
sample.info <- sample.metadata[match(sample.metadata$SAMPID, row.names(pca$rotation)), "SMTS", drop = TRUE]
sample.info <- factor(sample.info, levels = unique(sample.info))
pca$clusters <- sample.info
```

```{r save_pca}
cat("Saving results...\n")
saveRDS(pca, file = "gtex_pca.RDS")
cat("Results saved...\n")
```

```{r display_session_info}
options(width = 120)
devtools::session_info()
```
